version_description:
Bug fixes
Updated help screens to iOS 7 design

+ iOS 8 support with full resolution on iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
+ Transcription option added for recordings

- Bug fixes
New re-download action for recordings that may not have previously downloaded successfully.

New features:
+ Optimized layout for the latest large device sizes
+ Playback controls to skip forward or backward
+ Rate adjustment to change playback speed

+Added new ability to rename your recordings
-Bug fixes

New features:
+ Optimized layout for the latest large device sizes
+ Playback controls to skip forward or backward
+ Rate adjustment to change playback speed

+ Updated recording process
+ More feedback to help merge calls
+ Bug fixes & improvements
